markdownRemark.html: La Siesta is a purpose-built course located in Calahonda and although it is a private club, visiting golfers are always welcome. It is a relatively small, but varied course and is good for all levels of players.

frontmatter.title: Club De Golf La Siesta
frontmatter.description: Club De Golf La Siesta - La Siesta is a purpose-built course located in Calahonda and although it is a private club, visiting golfers are always welcome. It is a relatively small, but varied course and is good for all levels of players.
frontmatter.address: Urb. Sitio de Calahonda, C/Jose Orbaneja s/n 29647 Mijas Costa, Málaga, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 27.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 27.00 euros
tags: Top golf courses Costa del Sol
